title: From PO to SBI chairman: Meet 'people's man' Challa Srinivasalu Setty who is now the new boss of India's biggest bank
description: Challa Sreenivasulu Setty is set to become the 27th chairman of State Bank of India on August 28. With extensive experience across various roles in SBI, Setty has handled corporate banking, stressed assets, and retail banking. He takes over at a time when the bank is experiencing exceptional performance.
